channel.title: How to get CounterStrike: Source and play online FOR FREE
channel.description:
Hi! Okay, many people here like Counterstrike, and if you're like me, you don't want to pay for it, right?! Well, thanks to DigitalZone and a Romanian site which may/may not be linked with them, you can! First of all, you're going to need the standalone. Here is a link which contains many mirrors. [url=http://css.uv.ro/download.php?cat=2&ref=0&subref=0]http://css.uv.ro/download.php?cat=2&ref=0&subref=0[/url] Now, you will need to patch it! Taken directly from the website, here are links for the 3 patches. Install them in the order listed. Patch #1 [url=http://css.uv.ro/download.php?cat=8&ref=0&subref=0]http://css.uv.ro/download.php?cat=8&ref=0&subref=0[/url] Patch #2 [url=http://css.uv.ro/download.php?file=98&cat=3&subref=0]http://css.uv.ro/download.php?file=98&cat=3&subref=0[/url] Patch #3 [url=http://css.uv.ro/download.php?file=102&cat=3&subref=0]http://css.uv.ro/download.php?file=102&cat=3&subref=0[/url] [Note - If you can't figure out how to download, you do it by clicking the little [img]http://css.uv.ro/modules/downloads/download.png[/img] button] Ok, now, to play online! addon: New Hamachi free servers! [follow the 2nd guide for connecting to join these]
62.75.163.146:27020 88.198.53.214:27035 88.198.53.214:27015
[Note that this is untested, but it should work.] You should try... HAMACHI! Thats right, that little program is pretty useful. [url=https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/]https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/ [/url] Unfortunately, it's now a logmein product :( But anyways, so once you are all patched and have Hamachi, you should create/join a network. Please follow Hamachi's tutorial on how to do that. Then, once you join a network that has a CS:S server running, you can do one of these two ways: 1. Go into Counterstrike, and look under the LAN tab for finding servers. If its not there, then: 2. Press the tilda (~) key on your keyboard and type in connect then the ip, which will be the IP of the hamachi network [or other server] (usually 5.x.x.x.x or something like that, which you will find next to the name of the network.) Note that you can also get some of these files off file sharing networks like Ares Galaxy. That concludes my tutorial, but for a footnote: Note that I have not yet tested the LAN feature as I have not had anyone to test it with, but i would gladly do it with anyone willing. I am not responsible for any bad things that happen out of this [good things... maybe... we'll talk :P] You can post your networks here. If you have any questions ask them here and I will try to answer.
This tutorial 100% written by Justis [me]. First tutorial, please post here your feedback or if you read it. Please do not leech. 45 views, no replies? Edit I think you [i]might[/i] be able to play on non vac servers, I'll test it later.

item.title: How to get CounterStrike: Source and play online FOR FREE
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:9, topic:111957”]the link is dead for pacsteam
and there are bots in the digitalzone standalone[/quote]
You must register on pacsteam for all games who don’t is on the list.

NEW link for download:
http://www.divshare.com/download/979468-28c

And yes you can have bot to play with on pacsteam or play on CS servers.

Read full topic

nator123123:

Please tell me there’s bots in CS:S or in pacsteam!

What you mean?

Pacsteam is A Steam client there you can get all the game free and it work like normal Steam exept you can’t play on Secure Servers.

That you can do inn Normal steam can you do inn Pacsteam (exept from buying things.)

@bowserjr2 wrote:

Pacsteam is a better.

Link: http://gmz.ptservers.org/pacmanx/viewforum.php?f=3

Download Link: http://rs108.rapidshare.com/files/37490185/pacsteam-05-06-2007.exe

Games so working with Pacsteam:

Wik and the fable of souls

Zuma Deluxe

Just login download CS and play like normal but don’t in secure servers.

You can read more here http://gmz.ptservers.org/pacmanx/viewtopic.php?t=4531

item.title: How to get CounterStrike: Source and play online FOR FREE
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Hi!
Okay, many people here like Counterstrike, and if you’re like me, you don’t want to pay for it, right?!
Well, thanks to DigitalZone and a Romanian site which may/may not be linked with them, you can!
First of all, you’re going to need the standalone. Here is a link which contains many mirrors.
http://css.uv.ro/download.php?cat=2&ref=0&subref=0
Now, you will need to patch it!
Taken directly from the website, here are links for the 3 patches.
Install them in the order listed.
Patch #1
http://css.uv.ro/download.php?cat=8&ref=0&subref=0
Patch #2
http://css.uv.ro/download.php?file=98&cat=3&subref=0
Patch #3
http://css.uv.ro/download.php?file=102&cat=3&subref=0
[Note - If you can’t figure out how to download, you do it by clicking the little button]
Ok, now, to play online!
addon:
New Hamachi free servers! [follow the 2nd guide for connecting to join these]

62.75.163.146:27020
88.198.53.214:27035
88.198.53.214:27015

[Note that this is untested, but it should work.]
You should try…
HAMACHI!
Thats right, that little program is pretty useful.
https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/

Unfortunately, it’s now a logmein product
But anyways, so once you are all patched and have Hamachi, you should create/join a network. Please follow Hamachi’s tutorial on how to do that.
Then, once you join a network that has a CS:S server running, you can do one of these two ways:

  1. Go into Counterstrike, and look under the LAN tab for finding servers. If its not there, then:
  2. Press the tilda (~) key on your keyboard and type in connect then the ip, which will be the IP of the hamachi network [or other server] (usually 5.x.x.x.x or something like that, which you will find next to the name of the network.)
    Note that you can also get some of these files off file sharing networks like Ares Galaxy.
    That concludes my tutorial, but for a footnote:
    Note that I have not yet tested the LAN feature as I have not had anyone to test it with, but i would gladly do it with anyone willing.
    I am not responsible for any bad things that happen out of this [good things… maybe… we’ll talk :P]
    You can post your networks here.
    If you have any questions ask them here and I will try to answer.

This tutorial 100% written by Justis [me].
First tutorial, please post here your feedback or if you read it. Please do not leech.
45 views, no replies?
Edit
I think you might be able to play on non vac servers, I’ll test it later.

Read full topic
